net.middell.combo
Class TextResource

java.lang.Object
  net.middell.combo.TextResource
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputSupplier<Reader>
public class TextResource
extends Object
implements InputSupplier<Reader>

A text-based resource to be delivered via HTTP.

Next to a reference to the resource's content supplier, this class models some metadata specific to HTTP-based delivery like a URI via which the resource can be referenced directly or the maximum time it can be cached by browsers or proxy servers.

Author:
Gregor Middell

protected  class TextResource.CSSURLRewriteFilterReader

Method Detail

getMediaType

public String getMediaType()
Determines the media type of the resource by mapping its filename extension in the source URI path.

For unknown filename extensions, it returns text/plain as a default.

Returns:
the media/MIME type

getInput

public Reader getInput()
                throws IOException
Creates a reader for this resource's content.

If the resource is of media type text/css, the reader is wrapped by a filter which rewrites url() references to external resources on the fly.

Specified by:
getInput in interface InputSupplier<Reader>
Returns:
a reader for this resource's content
Throws:
IOException
